remarks: Lemma for isomorphism H of a lattice meet.  (Contributed by NM, 7-Apr-2014.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:

dihmeetlem14N $p |- ( ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ Y e. B /\ p e. B ) /\ ( ( r e. A /\ -. r .<_ W ) /\ r .<_ Y /\ ( Y ./\ p ) .<_ W ) ) -> ( ( I ` ( Y ./\ p ) ) .(+) ( ( I ` r ) i^i ( I ` p ) ) ) = ( ( I ` Y ) i^i ( I ` p ) ) ) $.
